thread.title: Guy Tells Painful Funny Story About Testing a Taser Out On Himself
thread.title_full: Guy Tells Painful Funny Story About Testing a Taser Out On Himself

author: Abby Heugel
title: Guy Tells Painful Funny Story About Testing a Taser Out On Himself
text:
465 Shares 
Look, we all do really stupid things sometimes, even though there's that voice in the back of our head that tells us we're about to do a really stupid thing. 
But I'm pretty proud to say that I've never thought of actually taking a taser to any part of my body, unlike our friend here Tony Welch who shared the painfully hilarious drama that played out involving a doubtful cat, a taser, a singlet, and a subsequent loss of bodily functions. It wasn't smart, but it made for one hell of a story.   #Bizarre
